messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Alan Rickman....again
messages.msgSnippet: ... I must watch that movie again. Rickman has some classic lines. But then he always gets the good ones. I remeber Robin Hood (man oh man Costner was terrible
messages.messageBody:
On 4 Nov 02, at 11:54, Pam Sorooshian wrote:

> And my favorite line -- "Does the rolling help?"
>
> --pam
>
I must watch that movie again. Rickman has some classic lines.
But then he always gets the good ones. I remeber Robin Hood
(man oh man Costner was terrible in that), some of the Sheriffs
lines were hysterical. He was the only thing worth watching in the
entire movie.

Shyrley

10 days to Harry Potter 2.....


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Alan Rickman....again
messages.msgSnippet: ... This thread just goes on and on doesn t it........... Shyrley You laugh at me because I m different. I laugh at you because you are all the same.
messages.messageBody:
On 4 Nov 02, at 11:56, Dnowens@... wrote:

> In a message dated 11/4/02 8:44:54 AM Central Standard Time,
> starsuncloud@... writes:
>
> > -Sense and Sensibility he plays Colonel Brandon >>
> >
> > I LOVE him in this role. Anyone that has only seen him as Snape MUST
> > see this movie. Yum for sure.
> >
> > Ren
>
> YES!!! I do believe its his eyes. He draws his brows together, lowers
> his chin, and then this deep smoldering look comes out. You just KNOW
> something is there! And his mouth.... ohhh my!
>
> ~Nancy who really shouldn't get so hot at almost 11 am!
>
This thread just goes on and on doesn't it...........

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Alan Rickman....again
messages.msgSnippet: Watching Galaxy Quest should be required by law. Citizenship should be revoked for those who cannot quote things like, We have to get out of here before those
messages.messageBody:
Watching Galaxy Quest should be required by law. Citizenship should be
revoked for those who cannot quote things like, "We have to get out of here
before those things kill Guy!"

Pam, who highly recommends the Fox TV show FIREFLY, which is on Friday
nights and is sort of a Galaxy Quest meets Battlestar Galactica (quality
scale much closer to the former than the latter).

----------
>From: SandraDodd@...
>To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Alan Rickman....again
>Date: Mon, Nov 4, 2002, 9:59 AM
>

>
> In a message dated 11/4/02 7:45:20 AM, starsuncloud@... writes:
>
> << I LOVE him in this role. Anyone that has only seen him as Snape MUST see
> this
> movie.
> Yum for sure. >>
>
> I concur.
>
> But anyone who has only seen him as snape should also see Galaxy Quest. And
> just WATCH IT, and the whole thing, too. I mean it.
>
> Sandra the grumpy cruise director

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Alan Rickman....again
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/4/02 7:45:20 AM, starsuncloud@cs.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/4/02 7:45:20 AM, starsuncloud@... writes:

<< I LOVE him in this role. Anyone that has only seen him as Snape MUST see
this
movie.
Yum for sure. >>

I concur.

But anyone who has only seen him as snape should also see Galaxy Quest. And
just WATCH IT, and the whole thing, too. I mean it.

Sandra the grumpy cruise director

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/4/02 8:44:54 AM Central Standard Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

> -Sense and Sensibility he plays Colonel Brandon >>
>
> I LOVE him in this role. Anyone that has only seen him as Snape MUST see
> this
> movie.
> Yum for sure.

YES!!! I do believe its his eyes. He draws his brows together, lowers his
chin, and then this deep smoldering look comes out. You just KNOW something
is there! And his mouth.... ohhh my!

~Nancy who really shouldn't get so hot at almost 11 am!

-Sense and Sensibility he plays Colonel Brandon >>

I LOVE him in this role. Anyone that has only seen him as Snape MUST see this
movie.
Yum for sure.

Ren
